item.title: ps_checkpayment - Made a payment with check
item.description: ps_checkpayment - Made a payment with check Details Component : ps_checkpayment Status : Approved Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-608 Steps Step Description Expected result Add a product to the cart Product should be added Go to the cart Cart should be displayed Click on order button Creation account form should be displayed Select the carrier and go to next step Payment page should be displayed Select check payment and go to next step Confirmation payment should be displayed
